devdoc.details: A smart-contract which distribute some mine coins by FPTCoin balance.

addWhiteList(address).details: Implementation of add an eligible address into the whitelist.

getWhiteList().details: Implementation of getting the eligible whitelist.

isEligibleAddress(address).details: Implementation of testing whether the input address is eligible.

isOwner().details: Returns true if the caller is the current owner.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

removeWhiteList(address).details: Implementation of revoke an invalid address from the whitelist.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner.      * NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

devdoc.title: FPTCoin mine pool, which manager contract is FPTCoin.

setHalt(bool).notice: function Emergency situation that requires contribution period to stop or not.
